thread.section_title: Tomtop 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 Tomtop 的点评意见 | www.tomtop.com
thread.title: mertkan Vural
thread.title_full: Tomtop 的点评人 mertkan Vural

author: mertkan Vural
title: mertkan Vural
text:
Wel To be honest i got a email from Tomtop. to make a feedback in return , I could get a 2 usd gift,. for me is not the gift importend. but the service
Wel i oder 2 time 4 pcs of product arround 60,- euro .
It was fast deliverd with out any problem.
I need to says,. at start i was scepties because of chines ,. but so they had a warehouse in germany to. so i oder and took a risk of 30 euro,.- to see if they delivery it on time as they promiss. Success i had the product in 3 days. i am happy with it. then i oder it again.
it clear website i understand it easy and fast delivery. I have not had a problem with them and hoop in future all so not to have :)
You can trust them and make a oder feel good on it. TomTop.
I am Mertkan From Netherland. Thanks again.
